title: One Piece 3D2Y: Ace no shi wo Koete! Luffy Nakama Tono Chikai
synopsis: After suffering great personal loss during the battle of Marineford, Monkey D. Luffy finds himself stranded on Rusukaina, a treacherous island crawling with huge and dangerous creatures. There, he has committed himself to a two-year stretch of training to learn "Haki," the energy that combatants can use to grant themselves a variety of abilities in battle.
characters: ['Monkey D., Luffy', 'Boa, Hancock', 'Roronoa, Zoro', 'Sanji', 'Nico, Robin', 'Tony Tony, Chopper', 'Usopp', 'Nami', 'Portgas D., Ace', 'Brook']
